translated: and in order to benefit all sentient beings,

original: gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i phyag bdag gi mgo la bzhag nas 'di skad ces /
analyzed: gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i phyag bdag gi mgo la bzhag nas 'di skad ces /

analyzed: kye rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ma 'ongs pa'i sdig pa can gyi dus kyi sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba chen po bya ba'i phyir snying  sngags 'di zungs @343b shig /
translated: “Oh son of noble family, in order to benefit all sentient beings in the future, evil times, and to bring them great happiness, you should hold this heart mantra.”

original: ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: ces bka' stsal to //
translated: He said this.

original: bdag ni / de'i tshe thog ma nyid du sa dad po la gnas par gyur to //
analyzed: bdag ni / de'i tshe thog ma nyid du sa dad po la gnas par gyur to //
translated: At that time, I became established on the first bhumi.

original: 'di ltar bdag gis gsang sngags 'di lan gcig thos pas de nyid na gnas bzhin du sa brgyad pa des par rtogs par gyur to //
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag gis gsang sngags 'di lan gcig thos pas de nyid na gnas bzhin du sa brgyad pa des par rtogs par gyur to //
translated: In this way, by hearing this mantra just once, while remaining here, I attained the eighth bhumi.

original: bdag gis de'i tshe snying la bab pa dang / dga' ba dang / yid bde ba thob nas de nyid du bdag gis smon lam 'di skad btab ste /
analyzed: bdag gis de'i tshe snying la bab pa dang / dga' ba dang / yid bde ba thob nas de nyid du bdag gis smon lam 'di skad btab ste /
translated: At that time, I was overjoyed and delighted. I made this aspiration:

original: 'di ltar bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / zhi bar bgyid nus par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / zhi bar bgyid nus par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: ‘If I am able to benefit, bring happiness, and bring peace to all sentient beings in the future,

original: da nges par bdag gi lus la lag pa stong dang / mig stong yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig ces bgyis pa dang / smon lam de skad btab ma thag tu de nyid na mchis bzhin du lag pa stong dang / mig stong yongs su rdzogs par gyur to //
analyzed: da nges par bdag gi lus la lag pa stong dang / mig stong yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig ces bgyis pa dang / smon lam de skad btab ma thag tu de nyid na mchis bzhin du lag pa stong dang / mig stong yongs su rdzogs par gyur to //
translated: then may my body be complete with a thousand hands and a thousand eyes.’ As soon as I made this aspiration, I was endowed with a thousand hands and a thousand eyes.

original: phyogs bcu dag tu sa chen po yang rnam pa drug tu g-yos so //
analyzed: phyogs bcu dag tu sa chen po yang rnam pa drug tu g-yos so //
translated: The great earth shook in six ways in the ten directions.

original: phyogs bcu nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis 'od zer stong stong bdag gi stong du bkye nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa snang bar gyur to; ;de slan chad sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das du ma'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams su yang
analyzed: phyogs bcu nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis 'od zer stong stong bdag gi stong du bkye nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa snang bar gyur to; ;de slan chad sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das du ma'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams su yang
translated: All the blessed buddhas in the ten directions emitted a thousand light rays, which illuminated the infinite world systems in the ten directions.

original: dang yang du rnyed cing thos te /🔽de dag gi spyan sngar gzungs sngags @344a *//
analyzed: dang yang du rnyed cing thos te / de dag gi spyan sngar gzungs sngags @344a *//
translated: From then on, I repeatedly encountered and heard this dhāraṇī mantra🔽in the circles of many blessed buddhas.

original: 'di bzung ngo //
analyzed: 'di bzung ngo //
translated: I upheld this dhāraṇī mantra in their presence.

original: yang dga' ba dang mgu ba du ma skyes par gyur to //
analyzed: yang dga' ba dang mgu ba du ma skyes par gyur to //
translated: I also gave rise to many joys and delights.

original: bdag gis bskal pa du mar skye ba dang / 'chi ba nges par rtogs pa phra mo thob par gyur to //
analyzed: bdag gis bskal pa du mar skye ba dang / 'chi ba nges par rtogs pa phra mo thob par gyur to //
translated: I attained the subtle realization of birth and death over many eons.

original: de slan chad rtag tu brjod cing bzung ste bskyud par ma gyur to //
analyzed: de slan chad rtag tu brjod cing bzung ste bskyud par ma gyur to //
translated: From then on, I always recited and upheld it without losing it.

original: gzungs sngags 'di gzung ba'i don du bdag gang dang gang du skyes par rtag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyan sngar padma las brdzus te skyes nas ma'i mngal du skye ba bzung bar ma gyur to //🔽dge slong ngam /
analyzed: gzungs sngags 'di gzung ba'i don du bdag gang dang gang du skyes par rtag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyan sngar padma las brdzus te skyes nas ma'i mngal du skye ba bzung bar ma gyur to // dge slong ngam /
translated: Wherever I am born, may it always be through the door of the womb of a lotus, in the presence of the Blessed Buddhas, and not through the door of the womb of a mother.🔽Whether I am a monk,

original: dge slong ma'am /
analyzed: dge slong ma'am /
translated: a nun,

original: dge bsnyen nam /
analyzed: dge bsnyen nam /
translated: a layman,

original: dge bsnyen ma'am /
analyzed: dge bsnyen ma'am /
translated: a laywoman,

analyzed: khye'u 'am / bu mo gang la la zhig brjod cing 'dzin par 'tshal ba des sems can thams cad la byams pa'i bsam pa dang / snying rje'i bsam pa'i sems bskyed par bgyi'o //
translated: a boy, or a girl, whoever recites and upholds this dhāraṇī, they should generate the mind of loving kindness and compassion towards all sentient beings.

original: thog mar bdag brjod pa'i 'og tu smon lam chen po 'di skad gdab par bgyi ste /
analyzed: thog mar bdag brjod pa'i 'og tu smon lam chen po 'di skad gdab par bgyi ste /
translated: First, after reciting my name, they should make this great aspiration:

analyzed: btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snying rje can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: bdag nges par shes rab chen po'i ming thob par gyur cig /
analyzed: bdag nges par shes rab chen po'i ming thob par gyur cig /
translated: May I attain the name of Great Wisdom.

original: btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snying rje can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snying rje can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //

analyzed: bdag nges par sems can yongs su skyob par gyur cig /

original: bdag nges par myur du thabs la mkhas pa thob par gyur cig /
analyzed: bdag nges par myur du thabs la mkhas pa thob par gyur cig /

analyzed: btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snying rje can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to you, O noble Avalokiteśvara, who are full of compassion!

analyzed: bdag nges par shes rab kyi grur zhugs par gyur cig /

analyzed: btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snying rje can po can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //

analyzed: btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snying rje chen po can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //

analyzed: bdag tshul khrims kyi rkang pa dang ldan zhing lam myur du thob par gyur cig /

original: btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snying rje chen po can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snying rje chen po can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to you, noble Avalokiteśvara, great compassionate one!

original: bdag nges par myur du mya ngan las 'das pa'i ri la 'dzeg par gyur cig /
analyzed: bdag nges par myur du mya ngan las 'das pa'i ri la 'dzeg par gyur cig /
translated: May I quickly ascend the mountain of nirvana.

original: btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snying rje can po khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snying rje can po khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to you, noble Avalokiteśvara, compassionate one!

original: bdag nges par myur du 'dus ma byas kyi khyim du 'jug par gyur cig /
analyzed: bdag nges par myur du 'dus ma byas kyi khyim du 'jug par gyur cig /
translated: May I quickly enter the house of the unconditioned.

original: btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snying rje can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snying rje can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to you, noble Avalokiteśvara, compassionate one!

original: bdag myur du chos kyi sku dang gcig tu gyur cig /🔽gang gi tshe bdag ral gri'i ri de la 'gro ba na ral gri'i ri de bsnyil zhing zhig par gyur cig /
analyzed: bdag myur du chos kyi sku dang gcig tu gyur cig / gang gi tshe bdag ral gri'i ri de la 'gro ba na ral gri'i ri de bsnyil zhing zhig par gyur cig /

original: gang gi tshe bdag me ma mur gyi @345a *//
analyzed: gang gi tshe bdag me ma mur gyi @345a *//
translated: When I enter the fire pit,

original: nang du 'gro ba na me ma mur de rang med par gyur cig /
analyzed: nang du 'gro ba na me ma mur de rang med par gyur cig /

original: gang gi tshe bdag sems can dmyal ba'i lam du 'gro ba na sems can dmyal ba rnams rang bzhin gyis stong par gyur cig /
analyzed: gang gi tshe bdag sems can dmyal ba'i lam du 'gro ba na sems can dmyal ba rnams rang bzhin gyis stong par gyur cig /
translated: When I go to the path of the hell beings, may the hell beings be naturally empty.

analyzed: gang gi tshe bdag gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba na yi dvags rnams rang tshim par gyur cig /

analyzed: gang gi tshe bdag lha ma yin gyi gnas su 'gro ba na de dag gi sems rang dul bar gyur cig /

analyzed: gang gi tshe bdag dud 'gro rnams su 'gro ba na de dag ye shes chen po'i de kho na rang thob par gyur cig /
translated: When I go to the animals, may they attain the reality of great wisdom.

analyzed: ces de ltar smon lam de skad btab nas dad pa ldan zhing sems kyis dran par bgyis la bdag gi ming brjod par bgyi'o //

original: de nas yang bdag gi slob dpon 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de nas yang bdag gi slob dpon 'di lta ste /

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med rtag tu dran par bgyi'o //

original: de nas gsang sngags 'di brjod par rigs so //
analyzed: de nas gsang sngags 'di brjod par rigs so //
translated: Then it is appropriate to recite this secret mantra.

original: nub gcig la 'di lan lnga brjod na /
analyzed: nub gcig la 'di lan lnga brjod na /
translated: If one recites this five times in one night,

original: bdag nyid kyi skye ba dang / 'chi ba bsags pa'i las lci ba stong phrag brgya dang / bye ba stong phrag bcu bsags pa rnams spong bar 'gyur; byang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bdag nyid kyi skye ba dang / 'chi ba bsags pa'i las lci ba stong phrag brgya dang / bye ba stong phrag bcu bsags pa rnams spong bar 'gyur; byang bar 'gyur ro //

original: yang bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa /
analyzed: yang bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa /
translated: Again, he said to the Blessed One,

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Venerable Blessed One,

analyzed: lha dang mi thams cad snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyi @345b gzungs sngags kyi gzhi 'di ji lta ba bzhin du brjod cing 'dzin na /

analyzed: khyod gang du skye bar 'dod /

analyzed: gang dang gang du smon lam btab pa der song zhig ces gsung ngo //
translated: Go wherever you aspire,'

analyzed: yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: he said to the Blessed One again,

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Venerable Transcendent Victor,

original: mi'am mi ma lags pa gang zhig snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyi gsang sngags 'di brjod cing 'dzin la /
analyzed: mi'am mi ma lags pa gang zhig snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyi gsang sngags 'di brjod cing 'dzin la /
translated: if any human or non-human being recites and upholds this mantra of the nature of great compassion,

analyzed: de gal te ngan song gsum du lhung bar gyur na /
translated: and if they should fall into the three lower realms,

analyzed: bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig /
translated: may I not fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete enlightenment.

analyzed: gang zhig gis gsang sngags 'di brjod cing bzung la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye ba ma thob na /
translated: If anyone recites and upholds this mantra, and does not take birth in the world systems of all the Buddha Transcendent Victors,

analyzed: bdag sangs rgyas su ma gyur cig /

analyzed: yang su zhig gis gsang sngags 'di brjod cing bzung la /
translated: Moreover, if anyone recites and upholds this mantra,

analyzed: des ting nge 'dzin dang / so so yang dag par rig pa du ma ma thob na /

original: bdag sangs rgyas su ma gyur cig /
analyzed: bdag sangs rgyas su ma gyur cig /
translated: may I not become a Buddha.🔽Moreover, if anyone recites and upholds this mantra,

original: yang su zhig gis gsang sngags 'di brjod cing bzung la /
analyzed: yang su zhig gis gsang sngags 'di brjod cing bzung la /
translated: and

analyzed: tshe gcig gis yid la bsam pa thams cad yongs su ma @346a *//
translated: If one does not fulfill all one’s wishes in a single lifetime,

analyzed: rdzogs pa / 'di snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyi snying po zhes bgyi ba'i ming thob par mi 'gyur ro // su sdig pa bgyid pa dang / ma dag pa ni /

original: ma gtogs so //
analyzed: ma gtogs so //
translated: Except for those who commit evil and are impure,

analyzed: bud med su zhig bud med kyi chos la yid byung nas bdag skyes par gyur cig ces 'tshal te /

analyzed: snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyi gzungs sngags kyi gzhi 'di brjod cing bzung la /

analyzed: gal te gsang sngags 'di brjod cing sdig pa thams cad 'byang bar ma gyur na //

original: dad pa drag pos gsang sngags 'di brjod na //
analyzed: dad pa drag pos gsang sngags 'di brjod na //

analyzed: de drung sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'gro mi 'gyur //

analyzed: 'dod chags bcings shing lag pas rmongs rnams dang // nyin mtshan mi drang ma zhi rtog ldan zhing //

analyzed: khyo dang lhan cig mi dga' bud med rnams //

analyzed: gal te snying po 'di yi mthu brjod na //
translated: If the power of this essence is described,🔽it will not reach the end in one eon.

analyzed: bskal pa gcig gis mtha' mar phyin mi @355b 'gyur; ;tshon skud sna lnga ba la snying po 'di lan lnga brgya bzlas brjod byas te mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa mgul du gdags so //
translated: One should recite this essence five hundred times on a five-colored thread, and tie twenty-one knots on it and wear it around the neck.

original: snying po 'di ni /
analyzed: snying po 'di ni /
translated: This essence

analyzed: sngon gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gangg'a'i klung dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed kyis sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir gsungs pa'o //
translated: was spoken by the past Blessed Buddhas equal to the sands of ninety-nine Ganges Rivers for the sake of sentient beings.

analyzed: gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug sgom par byed la yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba de dag la myur du yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir gsungs so //
translated: He taught it so that those who practice the six perfections but do not complete them might quickly complete them.

original: gang dag sangs rgyas nyid du sems ma bskyed pa de dag kyang byang chub tu sems bskyed par byed do //
analyzed: gang dag sangs rgyas nyid du sems ma bskyed pa de dag kyang byang chub tu sems bskyed par byed do //
translated: He taught it so that those who have not given rise to the mind set on awakening might give rise to the mind set on awakening.🔽He taught it so that those who have not attained the result of a śrāvaka might quickly attain it.

original: gang nyan thos kyi 'bras bu ma thob pa de dag kyang myur du thob par byed do; ;stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na lha'i drang srong gang dag byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa ji snyed 'khod pa de dag kyang sems bskyed par
analyzed: gang nyan thos kyi 'bras bu ma thob pa de dag kyang myur du thob par byed do; ;stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na lha'i drang srong gang dag byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa ji snyed 'khod pa de dag kyang sems bskyed par
translated: He taught it so that as many divine sages as there are in the worlds of the great trichiliocosm who have not given rise to the mind set on awakening might give rise to the mind set on awakening.

original: byed do // gang theg pa chen po'i chos la dbang po rnams dad pas ma rnyed pa de dag kyang thob par byed do //
analyzed: byed do // gang theg pa chen po'i chos la dbang po rnams dad pas ma rnyed pa de dag kyang thob par byed do //
translated: He taught it so that those who have not attained the faculties of faith in the Dharma of the Great Vehicle might attain them.

original: snying po 'di'i mthus theg pa chen po la thar pa'i sa bon gyi myu gu 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: snying po 'di'i mthus theg pa chen po la thar pa'i sa bon gyi myu gu 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
translated: By the power of this essence, the sprouts of the seed of liberation in the Great Vehicle will grow.

original: gal te dgos pa zhig yod na yang kho bo'i snying rje dang / thabs la mkhas pas thams cad 'grub bo //
analyzed: gal te dgos pa zhig yod na yang kho bo'i snying rje dang / thabs la mkhas pas thams cad 'grub bo //
translated: If there is a need, everything will be accomplished by my compassion and skillful means.

original: stong @356a *// gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na mun pa mun nag gi sems can dmyal ba dag na sems can gang dag gnas pa rnams kyang gal te snying po 'di thos na /
analyzed: stong @356a *// gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na mun pa mun nag gi sems can dmyal ba dag na sems can gang dag gnas pa rnams kyang gal te snying po 'di thos na /
translated: In the great trichiliocosm, even the sentient beings who dwell in the hells of darkness and gloom, if they hear this essence,

original: sdug bsngal rnams las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sdug bsngal rnams las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro //

original: byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sa dang po ma thob pa de dag kyang sa bcu nas sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sa dang po ma thob pa de dag kyang sa bcu nas sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: Those bodhisattvas who have not attained the first bhūmi will attain the ten bhūmis up to the enlightenment of buddhahood.

original: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu rnams kyang rang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu rnams kyang rang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: The thirty-two marks and eighty minor marks of a great being will also be completely perfected.

original: nyan thos kyi theg pa can gyi sems can gang dag gis snying po 'di lan gcig thos na drang po'i sems kyi bsam pas mos shing sgom par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nyan thos kyi theg pa can gyi sems can gang dag gis snying po 'di lan gcig thos na drang po'i sems kyi bsam pas mos shing sgom par 'gyur ro //
translated: Any sentient beings who have the vehicle of the śrāvakas, if they hear this essence once, will cultivate it with a sincere, devoted attitude.

original: dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi yang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'thob bo //
analyzed: dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi yang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'thob bo //
translated: They will attain the four fruits of the ascetic life just as they wish.

original: gal te de ltar bzod na /
analyzed: gal te de ltar bzod na /
translated: If they can bear it in this way,

original: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi phyi nang na yod pa'i ri dang / rdo dang / rtsig pa dang / ri rab dang / ri khor yug rnams kyang g-yo zhing rdul phra rab bzhin du phye mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi phyi nang na yod pa'i ri dang / rdo dang / rtsig pa dang / ri rab dang / ri khor yug rnams kyang g-yo zhing rdul phra rab bzhin du phye mar 'gyur ro //
translated: the mountains, rocks, walls, Mount Sumeru, and surrounding mountains in the outer and inner worlds of the trichiliocosm will shake and be reduced to dust.

original: rgya mtsho chen po bzhi yang khol zhing 'thor bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgya mtsho chen po bzhi yang khol zhing 'thor bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The four great oceans will boil and scatter.

original: gal te de dang @356b de'i gam yo na sems can gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad ji ltar byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de bzhin du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te de dang @356b de'i gam yo na sems can gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad ji ltar byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de bzhin du 'gyur ro //
translated: If they are near it, all the sentient beings who are there will become just like those who have given rise to the mind of awakening in that way.

original: gang gi tshe 'di la dam par gyur pa de dag gis nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig tu tshul khrims dang ldan par byas la snying po 'di bzlas brjod byas na /
analyzed: gang gi tshe 'di la dam par gyur pa de dag gis nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig tu tshul khrims dang ldan par byas la snying po 'di bzlas brjod byas na /
translated: If one who has become a holy person recites this essence for twenty-one days while maintaining ethical discipline,

original: yid la bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yid la bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: all his mental intentions will be fulfilled.

original: thog ma med pa'i tha ma'i mtha'i bar gyi sdig pa'i las gang yin pa de dag thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thog ma med pa'i tha ma'i mtha'i bar gyi sdig pa'i las gang yin pa de dag thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: All his evil actions from beginningless time until the end of the future will be purified.

original: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi phyi nang gi sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / lha'i drang srong dang / klu'i rgyal po thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi phyi nang gi sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / lha'i drang srong dang / klu'i rgyal po thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro //
translated: All the buddhas, bodhisattvas, Śakras, Brahmās, Lokapālas, divine sages, and all the nāga kings in the outer and inner worlds of the trichiliocosm will be brought under his control.

original: mi'am lha gang la la zhig gsang sngags 'di kha ton byed pa de 'bab chu'am; rgya mtshor khrus byas na /
analyzed: mi'am lha gang la la zhig gsang sngags 'di kha ton byed pa de 'bab chu'am; rgya mtshor khrus byas na /
translated: If any human or god recites this mantra while bathing in a river or the ocean,

analyzed: de na srog chags gang dag 'khod pa la des reg pa de dag gi las shin tu lci ba thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur /

original: tshe phyi ma la sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par padma las brdzus te skyes par 'gyur //🔽mngal nas skye ba dang / drod gsher las skye ba dang / sgo nga @357a *//
analyzed: tshe phyi ma la sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par padma las brdzus te skyes par 'gyur // mngal nas skye ba dang / drod gsher las skye ba dang / sgo nga @357a *//
translated: In their next lives, they will be born miraculously from a lotus in a pure buddha realm.

original: las skye ba 'dzin par mi 'gyur na /
analyzed: las skye ba 'dzin par mi 'gyur na /
translated: They will not take birth from a womb, from heat and moisture, or from an egg.

original: gang 'di 'dzin pa dang / brjod pa dang / klog pa lta ci smos /
analyzed: gang 'di 'dzin pa dang / brjod pa dang / klog pa lta ci smos /
translated: What need is there to mention those who uphold, recite, and read it?🔽What need is there to mention those who wish to uphold it, recite it, and read it?

original: 'dod cing brjod pa lta yang ci smos; rlung gang gis rig sngags 'chang la reg pa'i rlung des sems can gang la la reg par gyur pa'i las lci ba thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dod cing brjod pa lta yang ci smos; rlung gang gis rig sngags 'chang la reg pa'i rlung des sems can gang la la reg par gyur pa'i las lci ba thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The karma of any being that the wind touches will be completely purified.

original: yang dang yang ngan song gsum du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yang dang yang ngan song gsum du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They will not go to the three lower realms again and again.

original: rtag tu sangs rgyas 'byung po'i skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rtag tu sangs rgyas 'byung po'i skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: They will always be born in the presence of the buddhas.

original: 'di ltar yang shes par bya ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar yang shes par bya ste /
translated: “You should know this:

original: gang 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba'i bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa ni /
analyzed: gang 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba'i bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa ni /
translated: The merit that comes from possessing and upholding this dhāraṇī

original: bsam gyis mi khyab cing dpag tu med do //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab cing dpag tu med do //
translated: is inconceivable and immeasurable.

original: gang la la snying po 'di brjod pa de'i kha nas tshig dge ba'am /
analyzed: gang la la snying po 'di brjod pa de'i kha nas tshig dge ba'am /
translated: Whatever words come from the mouth of someone who recites this essence,

original: mi dge ba ci byung yang rung ste /
analyzed: mi dge ba ci byung yang rung ste /
translated: whether they are virtuous or nonvirtuous,

original: de thams cad bdud dang / gzhan mu stegs can dang / srung ba'i lha dang / klu dang / 'byung po rnams kyis yongs su dag pa'i chos su thos par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de thams cad bdud dang / gzhan mu stegs can dang / srung ba'i lha dang / klu dang / 'byung po rnams kyis yongs su dag pa'i chos su thos par 'gyur ro //
translated: all of them will be heard by the māras, tīrthikas, and the gods, nāgas, and bhūtas who guard the Dharma as the pure Dharma.

original: su snying po 'di kha ton byed pa de la thams cad sangs rgyas su 'du shes bskyed cing gus par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: su snying po 'di kha ton byed pa de la thams cad sangs rgyas su 'du shes bskyed cing gus par 'gyur ro //
translated: Everyone will develop the perception of him as a buddha and will respect him.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+g'a'i klung dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab snyed dag gis sdug par dgongs @357b shing yongs su bzung ba de ni /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+g'a'i klung dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab snyed dag gis sdug par dgongs @357b shing yongs su bzung ba de ni /
translated: This dhāraṇī is cherished and regarded with affection by as many buddhas as there are atoms in as many buddhafields as there are grains of sand in the Ganges.

original: sangs rgyas kyi sku'i mdzod du shes par bya'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi sku'i mdzod du shes par bya'o //
translated: It should be known as the treasury of the body of the buddhas.

original: de ni / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi snang bas snang bar 'gyur bas /
analyzed: de ni / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi snang bas snang bar 'gyur bas /
translated: It is the treasury of the light of all the buddhas,

original: lus 'od zer dang ldan par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: lus 'od zer dang ldan par shes par bya'o //
translated: and so one should know that the body is endowed with light.

original: gang snying po 'dis sems can rnams yongs su skyob pa de snying rje'i mdzod du shes par bya'o //
analyzed: gang snying po 'dis sems can rnams yongs su skyob pa de snying rje'i mdzod du shes par bya'o //
translated: It is the treasury of compassion, for it protects beings with this essence.

original: gang gzungs kyi sgo rnams sdud pa de chos kyi mdzod du shes par bya'o //
analyzed: gang gzungs kyi sgo rnams sdud pa de chos kyi mdzod du shes par bya'o //
translated: It is the treasury of the Dharma, for it gathers the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: gang la ting 'dzin brgya stong mngon du snang ba de bsam gtan dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i mdzod du shes par bya'o //
analyzed: gang la ting 'dzin brgya stong mngon du snang ba de bsam gtan dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i mdzod du shes par bya'o //
translated: It is the treasury of meditative concentration and meditative absorption, for it manifests hundreds of thousands of samādhis.

original: gang stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis sems can rnams la blta ba de nam mkha'i snying po'i mdzod du shes par bya'o //
analyzed: gang stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis sems can rnams la blta ba de nam mkha'i snying po'i mdzod du shes par bya'o //
translated: It is the treasury of Ākāśagarbha, for it views beings with the wisdom of emptiness.

original: gang la rtag tu lha dag dang / lha rnams kyis kun tu bsrungs pa de mi 'jigs pa'i mdzod du shes par bya'o //
analyzed: gang la rtag tu lha dag dang / lha rnams kyis kun tu bsrungs pa de mi 'jigs pa'i mdzod du shes par bya'o //
translated: It is the treasury of fearlessness, for it is always protected by the gods and the assemblies of gods.

original: gang gi kha nas gzungs kyi sgra rgyun mi 'chad pa de gtam sna tshogs kyi mdzod du shes par bya'o //
analyzed: gang gi kha nas gzungs kyi sgra rgyun mi 'chad pa de gtam sna tshogs kyi mdzod du shes par bya'o //
translated: One should know that the one from whose mouth the sound of the dhāraṇī is uninterrupted is the treasure of various stories.🔽One should know that the one who is not destroyed by the three kinds of epidemics and bad times is the treasure of constant abiding.

original: gang yams kyi nad rnam gsum dang / dus ngan pas chud mi zos pa de rtag tu gnas pa'i mdzod du shes par bya'o; ;gang bdud dang / gzhan mu stegs can gyis bar du gcod cing bzlog mi nus pa de'i mi'i sha'i mdzod ji lta ba bzhin ma yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: gang yams kyi nad rnam gsum dang / dus ngan pas chud mi zos pa de rtag tu gnas pa'i mdzod du shes par bya'o; ;gang bdud dang / gzhan mu stegs can gyis bar du gcod cing bzlog mi nus pa de'i mi'i sha'i mdzod ji lta ba bzhin ma yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: One should know that the one whose human flesh treasure cannot be obstructed or turned back by Māra or other non-Buddhists is not as it seems.

original: gang @358a *// rtag tu snying po 'dis sems can thams cad gso bar byed pa de sman gyi rgyal po'i mdzod du shes par bya'o //🔽gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba la 'byung ba de ni /
analyzed: gang @358a *// rtag tu snying po 'dis sems can thams cad gso bar byed pa de sman gyi rgyal po'i mdzod du shes par bya'o // gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba la 'byung ba de ni /
translated: One should know that the one who always heals all beings with this essence is the treasure of the king of medicines.🔽One should know that the one who goes to the buddha-fields

original: mngon par shes par bya ste /🔽de'i bsod nams kyi ba sngags pa ni /
analyzed: mngon par shes par bya ste / de'i bsod nams kyi ba sngags pa ni /
translated: is the one who has attained the superknowledges.🔽The accumulation of merit

original: mtha' yas so //
analyzed: mtha' yas so //
translated: of that one is limitless.

original: gal te rigs kyi bu mir gyur pa zhig yun ring po'i 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis skyo zhing bde ba 'dod na /
analyzed: gal te rigs kyi bu mir gyur pa zhig yun ring po'i 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis skyo zhing bde ba 'dod na /
translated: If a son or daughter of noble family, who is weary of the suffering of saṃsāra and desires happiness,

original: des thog mar bas mtha' dben pa'i gnas btsal bar bya ste /
analyzed: des thog mar bas mtha' dben pa'i gnas btsal bar bya ste /
translated: should first seek out a secluded place in the wilderness,

original: der 'dug par bya'o //
analyzed: der 'dug par bya'o //
translated: and then stay there.

original: gtsang mar mtshams legs par gcad par bya'o //
analyzed: gtsang mar mtshams legs par gcad par bya'o //
translated: He should properly establish the boundary of purity.

original: gal te chu la bzlas brjod byas sam /
analyzed: gal te chu la bzlas brjod byas sam /
translated: If he recites the mantra over water,

original: yang na zas sam; thug pa'am /
analyzed: yang na zas sam; thug pa'am /
translated: or over food, porridge,

original: sman nam / bdug pa la so sor lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te spyad na tshe ring por 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sman nam / bdug pa la so sor lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te spyad na tshe ring por 'gyur ro //

original: mthu yod par 'gyur ro; ;mtshams gcod nus par 'gyur ro //🔽rjes su mthun pa'i chos len pa'am /
analyzed: mthu yod par 'gyur ro; ;mtshams gcod nus par 'gyur ro // rjes su mthun pa'i chos len pa'am /
translated: He will have power, and he will be able to establish the boundary.

original: 'dzin nus par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dzin nus par 'gyur ro //
translated: He will be able to take up or uphold the Dharma that is in accord with it.

original: thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //🔽de la mtshams gcad pa'i cho ga ni /
analyzed: thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro // de la mtshams gcad pa'i cho ga ni /
translated: Everything will be accomplished.

original: 'di yin te /
analyzed: 'di yin te /
translated: The rite for establishing the boundary is as follows:

original: thog mar ral gri la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas la dkyil 'khor gcad @358b bar bya'o //
analyzed: thog mar ral gri la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas la dkyil 'khor gcad @358b bar bya'o //
translated: First, one should recite the mantra over a sword twenty-one times and cut the maṇḍala.

original: yang na chu gtsang ma la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas nas phyogs bzhir gtor bar bya ste /
analyzed: yang na chu gtsang ma la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas nas phyogs bzhir gtor bar bya ste /
translated: Or else, having enchanted pure water twenty-one times, scatter it in the four directions.

original: 'di ni / mtshams so //
analyzed: 'di ni / mtshams so //
translated: This is the boundary.

original: yang na yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas la phyogs bzhir gtor na mtshams bcad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yang na yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas la phyogs bzhir gtor na mtshams bcad par 'gyur ro //
translated: Or else, having enchanted white mustard seeds twenty-one times, scatter them in the four directions, and the boundary will be set.

original: yang na ji tsam 'dod pa sems kyis byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
analyzed: yang na ji tsam 'dod pa sems kyis byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
translated: Or else, bless it with the mind as much as you wish.

original: yang na thal ba gtsang ma la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te mtshams gcad do //
analyzed: yang na thal ba gtsang ma la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te mtshams gcad do //
translated: Or else, enchant clean ash twenty-one times and set the boundary.

original: yang na tshon skud sna lnga pa la bzlas brjod byas la phyogs bzhir bres na /
analyzed: yang na tshon skud sna lnga pa la bzlas brjod byas la phyogs bzhir bres na /
translated: Or else, having enchanted a five-colored thread, stretch it in the four directions,

original: thams cad du mtshams bcad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thams cad du mtshams bcad par 'gyur ro //
translated: and the boundary will be set everywhere.

original: cho ga 'dis len cing 'dzin nus par 'gyur na /
analyzed: cho ga 'dis len cing 'dzin nus par 'gyur na /
translated: If you are able to take up and hold this rite,

original: bdag nyid 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bdag nyid 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: you will attain the fruit for yourself.

original: sus snying po 'di'i ming thos pa de'i bskal pa du ma'i skye ba dang 'chi ba bsags pa'i las lci ba rnams kyang 'byang bar 'gyur na; su 'di rjod cing 'dzin pa lta ci smos //
analyzed: sus snying po 'di'i ming thos pa de'i bskal pa du ma'i skye ba dang 'chi ba bsags pa'i las lci ba rnams kyang 'byang bar 'gyur na; su 'di rjod cing 'dzin pa lta ci smos //
translated: If the karma of those who hear the name of this essence is purified, even though it is heavy with the accumulation of birth and death over many eons, what need is there to mention those who recite and uphold it?

original: gang zhing 'di rjod cing smra bar nus pa de sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa du ma la mchod cing bsod nams dang dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: gang zhing 'di rjod cing smra bar nus pa de sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa du ma la mchod cing bsod nams dang dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: One should know that those who are able to recite and speak of this field have made offerings to many past thus-gone ones and have accumulated merit and roots of virtue.

original: gal te cho ga 'dis sems can gyi khams sdug bsngal la gnas pa thams cad gdon par byed @359a *//🔽nus par gyur na /
analyzed: gal te cho ga 'dis sems can gyi khams sdug bsngal la gnas pa thams cad gdon par byed @359a *// nus par gyur na /
translated: If this ritual were able to liberate all the realms of sentient beings who dwell in suffering,

original: mi de ni /
analyzed: mi de ni /
translated: one should know that that person

original: snying po chen po dang ldan zhing ring po mi thogs par sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'thob par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: snying po chen po dang ldan zhing ring po mi thogs par sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'thob par rig par bya'o //
translated: possesses the great essence and will attain the enlightenment of buddhahood before long.

original: rig sngags 'chang des sems can ji snyed mthong ba dang / sems can so so la brjod pa dang / de la gang dag gis thos pa dang byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rig sngags 'chang des sems can ji snyed mthong ba dang / sems can so so la brjod pa dang / de la gang dag gis thos pa dang byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur ro //
translated: and whatever he says to each sentient being, they will hear and it will become a cause for awakening.

original: rig sngags 'chang de'i bsod nams dang / dge ba'i mtha' ni /
analyzed: rig sngags 'chang de'i bsod nams dang / dge ba'i mtha' ni /
translated: The vidyādhara’s merit and virtue

original: brjod mi nus par dpag tu med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: brjod mi nus par dpag tu med par 'gyur ro //
translated: will be inexpressible and immeasurable.

original: gal te lus bsdams shing zas dus su za bar gnas la dge zhing drang po'i sems kyis brjod par nus na /
analyzed: gal te lus bsdams shing zas dus su za bar gnas la dge zhing drang po'i sems kyis brjod par nus na /
translated: If he abides in bodily restraint and eats at the proper time, and if he can say this with a virtuous and honest mind,

original: des de'i tshe sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi ched du sngon gyi las rnams bshags par bya'o //
analyzed: des de'i tshe sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi ched du sngon gyi las rnams bshags par bya'o //
translated: then at that time he should confess all his past actions for the sake of the entire realm of sentient beings.

original: bdag nyid kyang de bzhin du bshags par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag nyid kyang de bzhin du bshags par bya'o //
translated: He should also confess in the same way for himself.

original: gal te de ltar goms shing rgyun mi 'chad par snying po 'di brjod na /
analyzed: gal te de ltar goms shing rgyun mi 'chad par snying po 'di brjod na /
translated: If he becomes accustomed to this and recites this essence continuously,

original: des tshe 'di la dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi thob par 'gyur /
analyzed: des tshe 'di la dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi thob par 'gyur /
translated: in this life he will attain the four fruits of the spiritual practitioner.

original: dbang po rno ba dang / blo dang ldan pa dang / bsam gtan la blo skye bar 'gyur /
analyzed: dbang po rno ba dang / blo dang ldan pa dang / bsam gtan la blo skye bar 'gyur /
translated: They will have sharp faculties, be intelligent, and their minds will be inclined toward meditative concentration.

original: sa bcu'i 'bras bu thob pa la mi dka' bar gyur na /
analyzed: sa bcu'i 'bras bu thob pa la mi dka' bar gyur na /
translated: If they are not obstructed in attaining the fruit of the ten grounds,

original: 'jig rten pa'i bsod nams kyi 'bras bu chung ngu 'thob pa lta ci smos /
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i bsod nams kyi 'bras bu chung ngu 'thob pa lta ci smos /
translated: what need is there to mention their attaining the small fruits of worldly merit?

original: ci dang ci @359b 'dod pa rnams de la yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: ci dang ci @359b 'dod pa rnams de la yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba med do //
translated: Whatever they wish for will be completely fulfilled.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this?

original: byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying rje chen po dang / smon lam chen po zab cing rgya che ba'i stobs kyis so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying rje chen po dang / smon lam chen po zab cing rgya che ba'i stobs kyis so //
translated: It is due to the power of the profound and vast great compassion and great aspirations of the bodhisattva Ārya Avalokiteśvara.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snying po 'di'i mthu stobs rgya chen po tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snying po 'di'i mthu stobs rgya chen po tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
translated: Then the Blessed One spoke to the venerable Ānanda about the vast power of this essence:

original: kun dga' bo /
analyzed: kun dga' bo /
translated: “Ānanda!

original: yul gang dang gang du yams kyi nad byung la /
analyzed: yul gang dang gang du yams kyi nad byung la /
translated: In whatever country a plague occurs,

original: yul der gal te rgyal pos chos kyis yul srung zhing rgya che ba dang / gtsang mar bya na /
analyzed: yul der gal te rgyal pos chos kyis yul srung zhing rgya che ba dang / gtsang mar bya na /
translated: If the king of that land protects the country with the Dharma, and acts in a vast and pure way,

original: sems can rnams stems las mi gcod do //
analyzed: sems can rnams stems las mi gcod do //
translated: then sentient beings will not be cut off from their lives.

original: nyes pa byung ba rnams la bzod par bya'o //
analyzed: nyes pa byung ba rnams la bzod par bya'o //
translated: One should be patient with those who have committed offenses.

original: rgyal po des lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus dang ldan par byas la /
analyzed: rgyal po des lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus dang ldan par byas la /
translated: That king should be endowed with physical and mental diligence,

original: zhag bdun snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyi snying po 'di bzlas brjod byas na /
analyzed: zhag bdun snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyi snying po 'di bzlas brjod byas na /
translated: and for seven days recite this essence of great compassion.

original: yul der yams kyi nad ci byung ba thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yul der yams kyi nad ci byung ba thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Whatever epidemics there are in that land will all be pacified.

original: lo tog thams cad kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lo tog thams cad kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: All crops will also be perfect.

original: sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur ro //
translated: All sentient beings will be happy.

original: gal te sa ris so sor dgra rgyun du 'ong zhing yul du gnas pa'i sems can rnams la gnod pa byed pa dang / mi yongs mi dga' bar gyur @360a *//
analyzed: gal te sa ris so sor dgra rgyun du 'ong zhing yul du gnas pa'i sems can rnams la gnod pa byed pa dang / mi yongs mi dga' bar gyur @360a *//
translated: If enemies from different lands constantly come and harm the sentient beings living in the country, and the people are unhappy,

original: pa dang / der nad byung ba dang / chu dus su mi 'bab pa dang / der zla ba dang nyi ma lam drang por mi 'gro ba dang / gal te sdig pa'i las de snyed byung na /
analyzed: pa dang / der nad byung ba dang / chu dus su mi 'bab pa dang / der zla ba dang nyi ma lam drang por mi 'gro ba dang / gal te sdig pa'i las de snyed byung na /
translated: If such evil deeds occur,

original: rgyal po des spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lag pa stong dang / mig stong dang ldan pa'i gzugs byas la /
analyzed: rgyal po des spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lag pa stong dang / mig stong dang ldan pa'i gzugs byas la /
translated: the king should make an image of Avalokiteśvara with a thousand arms and a thousand eyes.

original: gang du yams kyi nad byung ba de logs su bzhin bstan te gzhag go //
analyzed: gang du yams kyi nad byung ba de logs su bzhin bstan te gzhag go //
translated: He should place it in the direction from which the epidemic is coming, facing that direction.

original: shin du dad pas bdug pa dang / me tog dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i ba dan sna tshogs dang / zhal zas ro brgya pas mchod par bya'o //
analyzed: shin du dad pas bdug pa dang / me tog dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i ba dan sna tshogs dang / zhal zas ro brgya pas mchod par bya'o //
translated: With great faith he should make offerings of incense, flowers, parasols, banners, various divine flags, and food of a hundred flavors.

original: de nas rgyal po des snying po 'di brjod pa'i phyir nyin zhag bdun du brtson 'grus brtan por gnas byas na /
analyzed: de nas rgyal po des snying po 'di brjod pa'i phyir nyin zhag bdun du brtson 'grus brtan por gnas byas na /
translated: Then, for seven days, the king should recite this essence mantra while maintaining a firm effort.

original: sa ris so sor dgra thams cad de la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sa ris so sor dgra thams cad de la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: In each of the directions, all the enemies will pay homage to him.

original: rang rang gi yul la dga' bar 'gyur /
analyzed: rang rang gi yul la dga' bar 'gyur /
translated: They will delight in their own lands.

original: sems 'thun par 'gyur /
analyzed: sems 'thun par 'gyur /
translated: They will be of one mind.

original: phan tshun grogs su 'gyur /
analyzed: phan tshun grogs su 'gyur /
translated: They will become friends with each other.

original: mi yongs dang rgyal bu thams cad kyang byas pa gzo zhing /
analyzed: mi yongs dang rgyal bu thams cad kyang byas pa gzo zhing /
translated: All the people and princes will be grateful

original: legs par byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: legs par byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: and will do what is right.

original: rgyal po'i btsun mo'i 'khor rnams kyang de la dga' ba bskyed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyal po'i btsun mo'i 'khor rnams kyang de la dga' ba bskyed par 'gyur ro //
translated: The king’s harem will also be delighted with him.

original: lha dang klu rnams kyang /
analyzed: lha dang klu rnams kyang /
translated: The gods and nāgas

original: @360b yul srung bar byed do //
analyzed: @360b yul srung bar byed do //
translated: will protect the country.

original: char yang dus su 'bab par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: char yang dus su 'bab par 'gyur ro //
translated: Rain will fall in a timely manner.

original: 'bras bu dang / lo tog rnams kyang mang zhing grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'bras bu dang / lo tog rnams kyang mang zhing grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: Fruits and harvests will be abundant and plentiful.

original: yul na gnas pa sems kyang bde ba dang / yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yul na gnas pa sems kyang bde ba dang / yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The minds of those living in the country will be happy and joyful.

original: gal te khyim gcig tu nad dang / gnod pa sna tshogs byung ngam /
analyzed: gal te khyim gcig tu nad dang / gnod pa sna tshogs byung ngam /
translated: If various illnesses and harms occur in a single house,

original: bdud dang 'byung po g-yon can gnas pas 'khrugs shing smra'am /
analyzed: bdud dang 'byung po g-yon can gnas pas 'khrugs shing smra'am /
translated: or if it is disturbed by the presence of a deceitful demon or ghost,

original: skur pa 'debs sam /
analyzed: skur pa 'debs sam /
translated: or if it is slandered,

original: gnod pa dag byung ngam /
analyzed: gnod pa dag byung ngam /
translated: or if harms occur,

original: phyi nang gi mi mthun pa chen po'am /
analyzed: phyi nang gi mi mthun pa chen po'am /
translated: or if there is a great internal or external disagreement,

original: chung ngu dag byung na de'i tshe spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lag pa stong dang / mig stong dang ldan pa de'i mdun du mchod pa byas la /
analyzed: chung ngu dag byung na de'i tshe spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lag pa stong dang / mig stong dang ldan pa de'i mdun du mchod pa byas la /
translated: If minor ones occur, then at that time, make offerings in front of Avalokiteśvara, who has a thousand hands and a thousand eyes.

original: shin tu dad pas snying po 'di lan stong bzlas brjod byas na /
analyzed: shin tu dad pas snying po 'di lan stong bzlas brjod byas na /
translated: With utmost faith, recite this essence mantra one thousand times.

original: gong du smos pa'i gnod pa de dag zhi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gong du smos pa'i gnod pa de dag zhi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The above-mentioned harms will be pacified.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the venerable Ānanda said this to the Blessed One:

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Venerable Blessed One,

original: snying po 'di'i ming ci zhes bgyi /
analyzed: snying po 'di'i ming ci zhes bgyi /
translated: what is the name of this essence?

original: ji ltar blang bar bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar blang bar bgyi /
translated: How should it be received?

original: ji ltar gzung bar bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar gzung bar bgyi /
translated: How should it be upheld?”

original: kun dga' bo snying po 'di'i ming ni mang du yod do /
analyzed: kun dga' bo snying po 'di'i ming ni mang du yod do /
translated: “Ānanda, there are many names for this essence.

original: gcig ni rgya cher dri ma med pa yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gcig ni rgya cher dri ma med pa yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya'o //
translated: One is called ‘The Vastly Pure and Perfect One.’

original: snying rje chen po thogs pa med pa zhes kyang bya'o //
analyzed: snying rje chen po thogs pa med pa zhes kyang bya'o //
translated: It is also called ‘The Unimpeded Great Compassion.’

original: sdug @361a *// bsngal las yongs su bskyob pa zhes kyang bya'o //
analyzed: sdug @361a *// bsngal las yongs su bskyob pa zhes kyang bya'o //
translated: It is also called ‘The Protector from Suffering.’

original: tshe 'phel bar byed pa zhes kyang bya'o //
analyzed: tshe 'phel bar byed pa zhes kyang bya'o //
translated: It is also called the life-extending dhāraṇī.

original: ngan 'gro'i lam rnam par 'jigs pa zhes kyang bya'o //🔽las kyi sgrib pa 'joms pa zhes kyang bya'o //
analyzed: ngan 'gro'i lam rnam par 'jigs pa zhes kyang bya'o // las kyi sgrib pa 'joms pa zhes kyang bya'o //
translated: It is also called the dhāraṇī that destroys the paths to the lower realms.🔽It is also called the dhāraṇī that destroys the obscurations of karma.

original: bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes kyang bya'o //
analyzed: bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes kyang bya'o //
translated: It is also called the dhāraṇī that fulfills all wishes.

original: sems kyi rjes mthun par dbang ba zhes kyang bya'o //
analyzed: sems kyi rjes mthun par dbang ba zhes kyang bya'o //
translated: It is also called the dhāraṇī that brings mastery in accordance with one’s mind.

original: sa gong mar myur du nges par rtogs par byed pa zhes kyang ste /
analyzed: sa gong mar myur du nges par rtogs par byed pa zhes kyang ste /
translated: It is also called the dhāraṇī that quickly brings certainty in the higher bhūmis.

original: kun dga' bo /
analyzed: kun dga' bo /
translated: Ānanda,

original: de ltar zungs shig /
analyzed: de ltar zungs shig /
translated: you should remember it in that way.”

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the venerable Ānanda said to the Blessed One,

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Respected Blessed One,

original: gang snying po drang po 'di ston pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di'i ming ci zhes bgyi /
analyzed: gang snying po drang po 'di ston pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di'i ming ci zhes bgyi /
translated: what is the name of this bodhisattva mahāsattva who teaches this straight and true essence?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces bya'o //
translated: “He is called the bodhisattva mahāsattva Avalokiteśvara.

original: mdo 'dzin pa zhes kyang bya'o //
analyzed: mdo 'dzin pa zhes kyang bya'o //
translated: He is also called the dhāraṇī-holder.”

original: 'od zer dang mig dang lag pa stong yod pa zhes kyang bya'o //
analyzed: 'od zer dang mig dang lag pa stong yod pa zhes kyang bya'o //
translated: He is also called the one with a thousand eyes and a thousand hands.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu ni dpag tu med cing bsam gyis mi khyab bo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu ni dpag tu med cing bsam gyis mi khyab bo //
translated: The supernormal power of the bodhisattva mahāsattva Avalokiteśvara is immeasurable and inconceivable.

original: 'di ni / 'das pa'i @361b bskal pa dpag tu med pa'i snga logs su byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te /

analyzed: 'di byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin rnams 'thob pa'i phyag rgya ste bcu gnyis pa'o //

analyzed: gzugs sngags ni 'di lags te /

analyzed: der smyung ba bgyis la nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig tu mchod pa'i las rgya cher bgyis na /

original: de na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer gtong ste /
analyzed: de na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer gtong ste /

original: de la the tshom mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: de la the tshom mi bgyi'o //

analyzed: slad kyis zla ba dang / nyi ma lta bu'i 'od kyang bgyid do //

analyzed: gang dge ba dang / dad pas mi bgyid pa des ni /

analyzed: ma gtogs so //

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' lag pa stong dang ldan pa'i cho ga'o //

analyzed: mig re re las kyang sangs rgyas @384a *// re re sprul te / de dag ni /

analyzed: bskal pa bzang po la sangs rgyas stong 'byung ba lags so //

analyzed: lag pa stong las lag pa re re la yang 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po re re sprul te / de dag ni /

original: thams cad kyi mchog go /
analyzed: thams cad kyi mchog go /

analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //

original: ngas gsang sngags 'di sangs rgyas kyi mthus rgyas par bshad na /
analyzed: ngas gsang sngags 'di sangs rgyas kyi mthus rgyas par bshad na /

analyzed: bskal pa 'das kyang mthar thug par mi 'gyur ro //

translated: When the bodhisattva Avalokitesvara heard this mantra from the World-Honored One, he was overjoyed and delighted. He took hold of it, bowed at the Buddha's feet, and recited this mantra:

analyzed: na mo ratna ra shmi tsandra aa la k'a ra m'arga te dza pu n+ya tsakshu ri ba sh'a ya r'a dz'a ya ta th'a ga t'a ya /

original: tadya th'a / ratna ratna /
analyzed: tadya th'a / ratna ratna /

original: ta ta sha ra ta /
analyzed: ta ta sha ra ta /

analyzed: ratna pra ti ma te /

analyzed: ratna bra bha ratna da ka @384b te sv'a h'a /

translated: When the bodhisattva-mahāsattva Avalokiteśvara had spoken this dhāraṇī, at that time the world systems of the great trichiliocosm shook in six ways up to the sphere of neither perception nor non-perception.

original: rab tu g-yos so //
analyzed: rab tu g-yos so //

analyzed: 'og min gyi lha'i ris na dbang phyug chen po yang mi bde bar gyur to //

original: zhes sgra chen po 'byin cing /
analyzed: zhes sgra chen po 'byin cing /

original: phar 'bros tshur 'bros te /
analyzed: phar 'bros tshur 'bros te /

original: gang song mi shes so //
analyzed: gang song mi shes so //

analyzed: de'i tshe sprul pas ngan song du gyur pa'i 'khor chen po la 'di skad ces smras so //

analyzed: gal te gsang sngags 'di las 'da' zhing 'gras par byed na /
translated: If you transgress and oppose this mantra,

analyzed: mgo bo rdul phra rab bzhin du bgyid do //

original: gsang sngags 'di'i mthus ni /
analyzed: gsang sngags 'di'i mthus ni /

analyzed: ri 'thor ro //

original: rgya mtsho chen po skem mo //
analyzed: rgya mtsho chen po skem mo //

analyzed: lha ma yin gyi dmag pham par bgyid do //

original: 'byung po rnams tshar gcod do //
analyzed: 'byung po rnams tshar gcod do //

analyzed: sdig pa can gyi mi rnams kyang tshar gcod do //

original: nad chen po dag kyang chad par bgyid /
analyzed: nad chen po dag kyang chad par bgyid /

original: yul srung bar yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yul srung bar yang 'gyur ro //

analyzed: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams @385a *//

original: kyang phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: kyang phyag 'tshal lo //

analyzed: rigs kyi bu gang la la zhig gsang sngags 'di brjod cing 'dzin pa de'i gzi brjid dang / stobs yun thung dus bshad par mi nus so //

analyzed: gzungs sngags 'di 'chang zhing brjod pa ni /

analyzed: phyug pa dang / stobs dang ldan pa dang / dbang dang ldan par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du rgyal po byams par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: byams par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: phyogs bzhir mtshams bcad par yang 'gyur ro //

analyzed: 'di ni / byang chub sems dpa'i so so'i rig pa'i phyag rgya thogs pa med pa ste /

analyzed: bcu gsum pa'o //

analyzed: bo dhi sa tva sya /

original: tadya th'a / dhu bi dhu bi /
analyzed: tadya th'a / dhu bi dhu bi /

original: k'a ya dhu pi /
analyzed: k'a ya dhu pi /

original: bra sha ma ni sv'a h'a /
analyzed: bra sha ma ni sv'a h'a /
translated: Praśamanisvähā |

analyzed: log par lta ba gzhan mu stegs can rnams 'dul bar nus so // su zhig dus gsum du gsang sngags 'di lan nyi shu rtsa re re brjod pa des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bye ba phrag bcu @386a *//

analyzed: la mchod pa'i las rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mchod pa bgyis par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: bud med du skye bar mi 'gyur ro //

analyzed: nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir 'ongs so //

analyzed: 'dir 'byung po rnams kyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro //

original: zhes gsung ngo //
analyzed: zhes gsung ngo //

analyzed: bskum par bgyi //

original: phyag rgya 'di @386b ni /
analyzed: phyag rgya 'di @386b ni /

analyzed: mtshams med pa lnga po dag dang / rtsa ba'i ltung ba bzhi po dag kyang 'byang bar bgyid nus par 'gyur ro //

original: sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po bskyed na /
analyzed: sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po bskyed na /

analyzed: las kyi rtsa ba thams cad tshig par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: lus la ltas rnam pa nyi shu rtsa brgyad 'byung bar 'gyur ro //

original: lus la gnod pa mi 'byung ngo //
